created_by: Florian Roth, Rich Warren, Christian Burkard
name: Mailbox Export to Exchange Webserver
description: Detects a successful export of an Exchange mailbox to untypical directory or with aspx name suffix which can be used to place a webshell or the needed role assignment for it
query: (winlog.channel:MSExchange\ Management AND ((\*.keyword:(*New\-MailboxExportRequest* AND *\ \-Mailbox\ *) AND \*.keyword:(*\-FilePath\ \"\\\\localhost\\C$* OR *\-FilePath\ \"\\\\127.0.0.1\\C$* OR *.aspx*)) OR \*.keyword:(*New\-ManagementRoleAssignment* AND *\ \-Role\ \"Mailbox\ Import\ Export\"* AND *\ \-User\ *)))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:MSExchange\ Management AND ((\*.keyword:(*New\-MailboxExportRequest* AND *\ \-Mailbox\ *) AND \*.keyword:(*\-FilePath\ \"\\\\localhost\\C$* OR *\-FilePath\ \"\\\\127.0.0.1\\C$* OR *.aspx*)) OR \*.keyword:(*New\-ManagementRoleAssignment* AND *\ \-Role\ \"Mailbox\ Import\ Export\"* AND *\ \-User\ *)))`
